attributes.action: Recalculate CSA Payment for Absent Parents
attributes.additional_details:
1.  Prior to the calculation of Child Maintenance amend CSA rules to include absent Parents:

   ·  Mortgage payments
   ·  Council tax
   ·  Cost of travel to work


2.   In addition a recalculation of the 15% per week so:

   ·  level 1 includes up to 52 days with the absent  parent and would reduce the 15% to 6/7 * 15%

   ·  level 2 from 53 days - 104 days would reduce the 15% to 5/7 * 15%

   -  and so on
